name: Sudoku (itch) (ArtistaCorp)
description:
Sudoku Smasher is FREE Sudoku Game available on Google Play with impressive graphics, cool music and lots of handy features.

Sudoku Smasher has been thoroughly coded for perfection to provide you completely random puzzles. Now challenge yourself with unlimited...??? Yes, that's correct unlimited puzzles with 4 levels of difficulty from Easy to Expert!

Game Features:
- Levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, Expert
- Impressive Graphics
- Smooth Interface
- Save & Resume
- Undo/Redo
- Notes
- Displaying conflicting digits
- Highlighting selected digit
- Statistics tracking
